title: Advanced Settings for Voice AI Agents in iMash
lede: This guide explains the advanced settings available for Voice AI Agents in iMash, including extracting structured data, managing contact lifecycle states, and integrating with external automations through webhooks.

steps.title: Extract Structured Data
steps.content:
1. In your agentâ€™s Advanced Settings, configure structured data extraction.
  2. Define what kind of data you want to capture (e.g., name, success evaluation, conversation summary).
  3. You can add a custom prompt to specify the type of structured data or directly provide a JSON schema definition.
  4. The extracted data will be available at the end of the conversation for analysis and integration.

steps.title: Send Data to an Endpoint
steps.content:
1. Enter a target URL in the advanced settings.
  2. Any configured structured data (e.g., summaries, evaluations) will automatically be sent to this endpoint.
  3. Use this to connect iMash with external systems like CRMs, Google Sheets, or APIs.

steps.title: Manage Contact Lifecycle States
steps.content:
1. Enable the option to let agents update a contactâ€™s Lifecycle State.
  2. Lifecycle states represent where a contact is in the sales or engagement process (e.g., Just Contacted, Ready for Sale, Converted).
  3. Customise lifecycle labels as needed, and allow agents to move contacts between states automatically after calls.

steps.title: Connect to Automations via Webhook
steps.content:
1. Go to the Automation screen in iMash.
  2. Create a new automation with the trigger Catch Webhook.
  3. Copy the live webhook URL provided.
  4. Paste this URL into the Advanced Settings of your agent.
  5. This enables you to send data directly into an automation workflow, such as emailing results, saving to Google Sheets, or triggering external APIs.

steps.title: Perform Internal Actions
steps.content:
• Advanced Settings can also trigger actions inside iMash itself, such as storing summaries or success evaluations.
  • You can access your system tables, review variables, and even create new records through automations.
  • This allows deep integration of conversation outcomes into your iMash account without external tools.

nextSteps.title: What's Next?
nextSteps.description: Now that youâ€™ve enabled advanced settings, you can fully integrate your Voice AI Agent with external and internal systems:

cards.title: Review Privacy Settings
cards.description: Control how data is stored and whether recordings are saved or discarded.

cards.title: Add Tools
cards.description: Enhance your agent with predefined or custom tools for additional functionality.

cards.title: Create Smart Flows
cards.description: Build complex workflows to automate data handling and trigger external services.
